src_text: Xitatimende xa Nhlengeletano ya Khabinete ya ti 9 Mudyaxihi 2018Khabinete yi hlanganile hi Ravunharhu, 9 Mudyaxihi 2018, eTuynhuys eKap Xiyimo xa Khabinete eka Timhakankulu1.Madzolonga ya ku ya hi Rimbewu (GBV) Khabinete yi tlhela yi sola madzolonga ehenhla ka vaxisati na vana, na ku kombela eka hinkwerhu eka mihlangano hinkwayo ku lwa na ku herisa madzolonga ehenhla ka vaxisati, vana, Vavasati vo rhandza rimbewu-fanana, Vavanuna vo rhandza rimbewu-fanana, rimbewumbirhi na lava nga cincaka rimbew
trg_text: Gender-based violence (GBV) Cabinet reiterates its condemnation of violence against women and children, and calls on all of us in our respective formations to take a stand in stopping violence against women, children and the Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender communitie

src_text: I ntirho wa MuAfrika-Dzonga wihi kumbe wihi ku dyondzisana hi timfanelo ta vaxisati na vana, na hi tindlela to hambanahambana leti nga kona ku pfuna vaxanisiwa hi madzolong Khabinete yi amukela xiboho xa Khotonkulu ya Gauteng Dzonga xa ku khotsa mudlayi Sandile Mantsoe ku tshama ekhotsweni malembe ya 32 eka ku dlaya khale ka muhlekisani wa yena Karabo Mokoen Eka milandzu yin wana yo fana na ku kumiwa ka ntsumbu wa n'wana wa malembe ya 10 Katlego Joja eMamelodi Vupeladyambu, evuxeni bya Pitori na ku dlayiwa ka Zolile Khumalo, ni khale ka muchudeni kulobye, eYunivhesiti ya Thekinoloji ya Mangosuthu eDurban, i vumbhoni bya ku ya emahlweni ka mitlhontlho leyi rixaka ri hlanganaka na yon Khabinete yi rhumela marito yo chavelela eka mindyangu ya ka Joja na Khumal Loko lava va vululami na tiejensi to sindzisa nawu ti ri na vun winyi bya ku tiyisisa leswaku lava nga endla manyala va hela va xupuriwa, tanihi vaaki hinkwerhu hi na ntirho lowu hi faneleke ku wu endla ku herisa vugevenga leby MaAfrika-Dzonga va hlohloteriwa ku nghenelela va gingirika eka minongonoko yo seketela na ku tlakusa ndzemukiso eka miganga na tisekitara ta vona to hambanahamban Khabinete yi tlhela yi khutaza vaxanisiwa ku vika vugevenga lebyi bya tihanyi eka vulawuri byo sindzisa nawu, lava va faneleke ku lavisisisa swihehlo swa GBV na ku tirha swinene hi ku landza nawu ku tiyisisa leswaku vululami bya fikeleriw Eka mhaka yo hambana kambe leyi yelanaka, Nhlengeletano yo Angarhela ya Nhlangano wa Matiko (UN) yi vekile 13 Khotavuxika tanihi Siku ra Ndzemukiso wa Alibinizimi wa Matiko ya Misav Phfumba ri lava ku tlakusa ndzemukiso mayelana na vanhu lava hanyaka na alibinizimi lava nga sirheleriwa hi ku hetiseka hi Vumbiwa ra Rhiphabuliki ya Afrika-Dzonga ra 1996.
trg_text: It is the duty of every South African to educate one another on the rights of women and children, and on the various recourse mechanisms that exist to help victims of violenc Cabinet welcomes the decision by the South Gauteng High Court to sentence convicted murderer Sandile Mantsoe to 32 years in prison for the murder of his ex-girlfriend Karabo Mokoen Other cases such as the discovery of the body of 10-year-old Katlego Joja in Mamelodi West, east of Pretoria and the killing of Zolile Khumalo, by a former student, at the Mangosuthu University of Technology in Durban, is testimony to the continuing challenges we face as a natio Cabinet extends its heartfelt condolences to the Joja and Khumalo familie While justice and the law-enforcement agencies are seized with ensuring that the perpetrators do not go unpunished, as a society we all have a role to play in stopping these crime South Africans are encouraged to actively join advocacy and awareness-raising programmes in their respective communities and sector Cabinet also encourages victims to report these heinous crimes to law-enforcement authorities, who must investigate allegations of GBV and act firmly within the ambit of the law to ensure that justice is serve In a separate but related issue, the United Nations (UN) General Assembly proclaimed 13 June as International Albinism Awareness Da The campaign aims to raise awareness about people living with albinism who are fully protected by the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996.

src_text: I ntirho wa MaAfrika-Dzonga hinkwawo ku ti dyondzisa na ku dyondzisa swirho swa vaaki hi alibinizimi leswaku ku bakanyeriwa etlhelo swikholwakholwani na leswi nga ri ki ntiyis Leswi swi ta hunguta ku chava loku nga kona eka vanhu lava nga na alibinizimi na mindyangu ya vona Xiboho xa Federexini ya Nhlangano wa Matiko ya Misava ya
trg_text: It is the duty of all South Africans to educate themselves and others in the community on albinism so as to dispel myths and misconception This will alleviate the trauma experienced by people with albinism and their families International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF) decision Cabinet expressed concerns with the developments regarding to the new regulations of the International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF).

src_text: Swipotso (IAAF) Khabinete yi kombise ku vilela hileswi humelelaka mayelana na swipimelo swintshwa IAA Khabinete yi amukela ntirho lowu nga ku endliweni hi Ndzawulo ya Mitlangu na Vuhungasi ya Afrika-Dzonga na leswaku, phanele ya xiyimo xa le henhla ya vativi eka swiyenge leswi fambelenaka swa mirhi na nawu swi hlanganisiwile hi SRS Phanele leyi yi ta hlaya swipimelo leswi hi vuxiyaxiya na ku kanela hi vumbhoni bya xisayense lebyi IAAF yi nga khomelela eka byon Yi ta kambela vulavisisi na vumbhoni bya xisayense hinkwabyo lebyi nga kona ku katsa na timhaka ta matikhomelo na ku tirhisa mbuyelo lowu ku tlhontlha swipimelo leswi eka tiforamu leti nga fanel
trg_text: Cabinet welcomes the work being done by the Department of Sport and Recreation South Africa and, the fact that a high level panel of experts in the related fields of medicine and law were assemble by SRS This panel will study these regulations closely and interrogate the scientific evidence that the IAAF had relied upo It will evaluate all available research & scientific evidence as well as related ethical issues and use the outcome to challenge these regulations in the appropriate forum Cabinet calls upon South Africans to

src_text: Khabinete yi kombela MaAfrika-Dzonga hinkwawo ku seketela van waswipotso hinkwavo lava nga va ka va khumbiwile hi swipimelo leswi kwala ekaya na lava nga le matikweni ya misava hinkwayo Xiyimo xa le N'walungu-Vupeladyambu Khabinete yi nyikiwile xiviko hi Xipano xa va Vaholobye (IMTT) mayelana na swa le N'walungu-Vupeladyamb Xiviko xi nyikile ntirho wo sungula lowu nga endliwa eka mavhiki mabirhi lawa ya nga hundz Khabinete yi enetekile hi ku humelela loku nga fikeleriwa hi IMTT eka matshalatshala ya yona ya ku tshamisekisa Xifundzankul
trg_text: support all athletes that may be affected by these regulations both here at home and in the rest of the world Situation in North West Cabinet was presented with the report by the Inter-Ministerial Task Team (IMTT) on North Wes The report provided the preliminary work that has been done in the last two week

src_text: IMTT, leyi nga rhangeriwa hi Holobye wa le Hofisini ya Phuresidente, Dok Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma, yi na vun winyi eka timhaka ta le N'walungu-Vupeladyamb Xiviko xo helela eka vahangalasamahungu hi mivuyelo ya ntirho lowu wa IMTT xi ta endliwa eN'walungu-Vupeladyambu vhiki leritaka Foramu ya Ikhonomi ya Mfumo-Mabindzu exikarhi ka Japan-Afri Phuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa u nyikile mbulavulo wa siku eka ku pfuriwa ka Foramu ya Ikhonomi ya Mfumo-Mabindzu exikarhi ka Japan-Afrika leyi a yi khomeriwile eSandton Convention Centre ku sukela hi ti3 ku fika hi ti 4 Mudyaxihi 2018.
trg_text: Cabinet was satisfied with the progress made by the IMTT in its efforts to stabilise the Provinc The IMTT, led by Minister in The Presidency, Dr Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, will remain seized with the North West issue A detailed media briefing on the outcomes of this work by the IMTT will be held in the North West next week Japan-Africa Public-Private Economic Forum President Cyril Ramaphosa delivered a keynote address at the inaugural Japan-Africa Public-Private Economic Forum held at the Sandton Convention Centre from 3 to 4 May 2018.

src_text: Foramu yi rhurheriwile xikan'we hi Afrika-Dzonga, na mfumo wa Japan na Nhlangano wa Mabindzu ya le Handle ka JapaKhabinete yi amukela ku tinyikela ku ya emahlweni loku endliweke eka Nhlengeletano ya Matiko ya Misava eTokyo hi Nhluvukiso wa Afrika eNairobi, eKenya hi 2016, loku nga vona Japan yi tshembisa US$30 wa tibiliyoni eAfrika exikarhi ka 2016 na 2019.
trg_text: The forum was co-hosted by South Africa, together with the government of Japan and the Japan External Trade OrganizatioCabinet welcomes the continued commitment that was made at the Tokyo International Conference on African Development in Nairobi, Kenya in 2016, which saw Japan pledging US$30 billion in Africa between 2016 and 2019.

src_text: Ku tlula 100 wa tikhamphani ta le Japan ti kona laha Afrika Ku Engeteleriwa ka Tihakelo ta Tinsimbhi na Aluminiyamu hi Amerika (US) Khabinete yi kombisa ku nga khomeki kahle hi xiboho xa Amerika ku ka yi nga humesi Afrika-Dzonga eka xikombelo xa ku nga hakeri swibalo swa tinsimbhi na aluminiyam Mfumo wa Afrika-Dzonga wu ta ya emahlweni na ku burisana na vulawuri bya Amerika ku kuma mbuyelo lowu amukelekaka eka
trg_text: report on South Africa's initiatives in the areas of education, work skills development and economic opportunities for young people, especially for those between 10 and 18 years ol UNICEF commended South Africa s efforts to create opportunities for young people to participate meaningfully in the economy, and expressed willingness to assist our country s schools with the provision of water and sanitationUNICEF has invited South Africa to share its success on youth empowerment as part of its global campaign to advance opportunities for youth

src_text: hinkwav Khabinete yi tlhela yi khutaza varhumeri va tinhundzu va laha kaya ku ya emahlweni va hlohlotela vaxavi va le Amerika ku endla xikombelo xa ku sivela ku hakeriwa ka swibalo, tanihileswi tikhamphani ta Afrika-Dzonga ti rhumelaka swimakiwa swa xiyimo xa le henhla na swimakiwa leswi nga helelangiki ku va swi ya hetisisiwa eAmerika Ku vuyelerisa Tiphaka ta Mabindzu Khabinete yi amukela ku hetisiwa ka xiyenge xo sungula xa ku vuyelerisa ka
trg_text: Once adopted, the Bill will ensure greater protection of workers in respect of injuries and diseases at the workplacThe Bill establishes a clearly defined Health and Safety Management System and is in line with international best practic It also provides for mandatory risk assessment to be conducted by the employer and a workplace-specific risk management plan developed and implemented to minimise the exposure of employees to ris Messages1.

src_text: Phaka ya Mabindzu ya Phuthaditjhaba eFree State tanihi goza ra nkoka eku simekiweni ka Phurogireme ya ku Vuyelerisa ka Tiphaka ta Mabindz Ku kurisa loku nga endliwa hi R50 wa timiliyoni ku ta koka rinoko eka van'wamabindzu va laha kaya ku sungula mitirho ya vona hi mhaka ya ku antswisiwa ka miako na vuhlayiseki Vuvekisi Khabinete yi bela mandla eka xinakulobye exikarhi ka Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu na Vumaki (dti) na Aspen Pharmacare, leswi nga endla leswaku ku tivisiwa vuvekisi bya R1 wa tibiliyoni eka feme ya ku endla swidzidziharisi ePort Elizabeth eka Kapa-Vux Khamphani ya ku endla mirhi yi vuyeriwile hi ku suka eka Xinavetisi xa Xibalo xa 12I xa
trg_text: This is the 10th iteration of a rolling annual action plan aligned to successive three-year cycles of the Medium Term Expenditure FrameworThe revised IPAP summarises the achievements of the industrial policy over the past nine year It provides an economic analysis of the global and domestic economy relevant to industrial policy, summarises the challenges and constraints to the optimal implementation of the industrial policy, as well as a range of transversal and sector specific time-bound key action plans assigned to the respective departments Cabinet approved that the Tripartite Free Trade Area (TFTA) Agreement be tabled in Parliament for ratificatio The agreement establishes the Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa, East African Community and Southern African Development CommunitThis TFTA is a key Africa-led project that marks a decisive step to overcome the continent s colonial heritage of small fragmented markets, by promoting intra-African investments and attracting more foreign investment into the free trade areAs a result of regional integration efforts and stable economies, there has been strong growth in intra-African investments Cabinet approved South Africa s Third National Communication Report for submission to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC).The primary objective of the UNFCCC is to achieve the stabilisation of greenhouse gas concentrations in the atmosphere to a level that would prevent dangerous anthropogenic activities from interfering with the climate systeSouth Africa s report contains an analysis of its progress from the initial National Communication to the Second National Communication and subsequently the Third Communication Report, as reviewed by the international community and domestic stakeholder Bills1.

src_text: dti hi ntsengo wa xibalo xa xikweleti wa kwalomu ka R209 wa timiliyon Ku pfuriwa ka muako swi ta tumbuluxa 500 wa mitirho yintshw Lebyi i vuvekisi byikulu lebyi yisaka Afrika-Dzonga eka xiyimo xintshwa xa ku vumaki na ku endla mitirho yintshwa ya nkoka leyi lavekaka etikweni Tihakelo ta le Hansi ta Datha Khabinete yi amukela milawu yintshwa leyi nga ringanyetiwa hi Ndzawulo yo Tiyimela ya Vuhlanganisi bya Afrika-Dzonga ku antswisa swipimelo mayelana na datha, SMS na vukorhokeri bya ku vulavul Ku cinca i magoza ya ku tiyisisa vululami eka matirhelo ya bindzu eka timhaka ta mahakelelo ya datha na ku tiyisisa leswaku vatirhisi va nga lahlekeriwi hi datha leyi va nga yi tirhisangik Vulavisisi bya Timakete lebyi nga le ku endliweni hi Khomixini ya Mphikizano byi ta kombisa swinene na ku kongomisa eka tindlela to engetela, ku tiyisisa leswaku tihakelo ta datha laha Afrika-Dzonga tiseketela mfikelelo wa dijithali wo anama na ku hi lulamisela swivandlanene leswi nga endliwa hi Hundzuluxo wa Vumaki wa Vumun
trg_text: More than 100 Japanese companies have a presence in Africa United States (US) Steel and Aluminum Tariff increase Cabinet expresses its disappointment on the decision by the US not to exempt South Africa from the application of steel and aluminum dutie The South African Government will continue to engage with US authorities to find a mutually acceptable outcom Cabinet also encourages domestic exporters to continue to lobby US buyers to apply for product exemptions, as South African companies export niche products and semi-processed products for further processing in the US Revitalisation of Industrial Parks Cabinet welcomes the completion of the first phase of the revitalisation of the Phuthaditjhaba Industrial Park in the Free State as an important milestone in implementing the Revitalisation of Industrial Parks Programm The R50-million upgrades will attract more local entrepreneurs to set up their operations due to the improved infrastructure and security Investment Cabinet congratulates the partnership between the Department of Trade and Industry (the dti) and Aspen Pharmacare, which has resulted in the announcement of a R1-billion investment in the pharmaceutical drug plant in Port Elizabeth in the Eastern Cap The pharmaceutical company benefited from the dti s 12I Tax Incentive with a tax credit of about R209 millio The opening of the facility will create 500 new job This is a significant investment which is taking South Africa into a new level of manufacturing space and creating the necessary jobs that the country needs Lower data costs Cabinet welcomes the new rules proposed by the Independent Communications Authority of South Africa to improve regulations around data, SMS and voice service The changes are steps toward ensuring fairness in business practice around data pricing and ensure that consumers will not lose unused dat The Market Inquiry being conducted by the Competition Commission will highlight and focus on additional measures, to ensure South African data prices support broader digital access and prepare us for the opportunities created by the Fourth Industrial Revolution Mining Sector Cabinet joins President Ramaphosa in expressing sadness following the loss of lives of mineworkers at the Sibanye-Stillwater s Driefontein Mine near Carletonville on the West Rand, and furthermore extends its condolences to the families and friends of the decease The Minister of Mineral Resources, Mr Gwede Mantashe, is expected to represent government at a memorial service to be held this wee Cabinet urges the mining sector to fast-track their research that will assist us in the capability in detecting seismic activities in the mines and save live UN Children s Fund (UNICEF)1 Cabinet joins President Ramaphosa in expressing appreciation for UNICEF s support and cooperation in empowering the youth of South

src_text: Sekithara ya Migodi Khabinete yi yima na Phuresidente Ramaphosa ku ku kombisa ku twa ku vava endzhaku ka ku lahleka ka vutomi bya vatirhi va le migodini eMugodini wa Sibanye-Stillwater s Driefontein ekusushi na Carletonville eWest Rand, naswona yi rhumela marito yo chavelela eka mindyangu na vanghana va lava hundzeke emisaven Holobye wa Swicelwa, Tat Gwede Mantashe, u languteriwe ku yimela mfumo eka ntirho wa ku tsundzuka lowu nga ta khomiwa eka vhiki ler Khabinete yi hlohlotela sekithara ya migodi ku hatlisisa vulavisisi bya yona lebyi nga ta hi pfuna eka vuswikoti bya ku kuma ku tsekatseka ka migodi na ku ponisa vutom Nkwama wa Vana wa UN (UNICEF)1 Khabinete yi yima na Phuresidente Ramaphosa eka ku kombisa ku nkhensa eka nseketelo na ntirhisano wa UNICEF eka ku nyika matimba eka vantshwa va Afrika-Dzonga1 Mulawurinkulu wa UNICEF, Manana Henrietta Fore, u endzerile ximfumo e Phuresidente Ramaphosa hi Musumbunuku, 7 Mudyaxihi 2018.
trg_text: AfricaExecutive Director of UNICEF, Ms Henrietta Fore, paid a courtesy call to President Ramaphosa on Monday, 7 May 2018.

src_text: UNICEF yi bele mandla eka Afrika-Dzonga eka ku tirha ku endla swivandlanene eka vantshwa ku ku va va nghenelela hi ku hetiseka eka ikhonomi, na ku kombisa ku tsakela ku pfuna swikolo swa tiko ra hina eka ku fikeleriwa ka mati na mbhasisoUNICEF yi rhambile Afrika-Dzonga ku avelana ku humelela ka yona eku nyikeni matimba eka vantshwa tanihi pfhumba ra matiko ya misava ku yisa emahlweni swivandlanene eka vantshwa - ku nga xikombiso xo tiya xa ku tiyisisa vuxaka bya tiko ra hina na U Swibohonkulu swa Khabinete1.

src_text: Khabinete yi pasisile Kungu ra Migingiriko ra Pholisi ya Vumaki (IPAP) 2018/19 - 2020/21.

src_text: Loku i ku vuyelela ka vu 10 ka kungu ra migingiriko ya lembe na lembe ya nhluvukiso lowu fambisanaka na ku humelela ka malembe ya nharhu hi ku landzelelana ka Rimba ra Ntirhiso wa le Xikarhi ka Them IPAP leyi nga pfuxetiwa i nkomiso wa leswi nga fikeleriwa eka pholisi ya vumaki eka malembe ya kaye lawa ya nga hundz Yi nyika nxopaxopo wa ikhonomi ya misava na ya laha kaya leyi nga fanela eka pholisi ya vumaki, nkomiso wa mitlhontlho na mitlimbo eka ku simekiwa hi ku hetiseka ka pholisi ya vumaki, ku katsa na ku cincana ko hambanahambana na makungu ya migingirikonkulu ya nkarhi lowu vekiweke hi sekithara yokarhi lawa ya nyikiweke tindzawulo hi ku hambana ka tona Khabinete yi pasisile Ntwanano wa Mabindzu ya Mihlangano yi Nharhu ya Mahala (TFTA) ku va yi andlariwa ePalamend Ntwanano wu tumbuluxa Makete lowu Fanaka wa le Vuxeni na le Dzongeni wa Afrika, Muganga wa le Vuxeni bya Afrika na Muganga wa Nhluvukiso wa le Dzongeni wa AfrikTFTA leyi i phurojeke leyi rhangeriwaka hi Afrika leyi kombisaka ku teka swiboho ku hlula ndzhaka ya xikoloni laha Afrika eka timakete letintsongo leti nga hambana, hi ku seketela vuvekisi bya kwala Afrika na ku koka rinoko ra vuvekisi byo tala bya matikomambe eka tindhawu ta mabindzu lawa ya nga ri ki na swipimelTanihi mbuyelo wa ku hlangana ka miganga na ku tshamiseka ka tiikhonomi, ku vile na ku kula eka vuvekisi bya kwala tikweninkulu ra Afrika eka vuvekisi Khabinete yi pasisile Xiviko xa Vuhlanganisi xa Rixaka xa Vunharhu xa Afrika-Dzonga ku va xi rhumeriwa eka Rimba ra UN eka Ntwanano wa ku Cinca ka Maxelo (UNFCCC).Xikongomelo xo rhanga xa UNFCCC i ku fikelela ntshamiseko eka nhlanganelo wa mimoya ya le xibakabakeni ku fika eka xiyimo lexi nga ta sivela migingiriko leyi nga ya khombo ya matumbulukelo ya vanhu ku va yi kavanyeta sisiteme ya maxel Xiviko xa Afrika-Dzonga xi na ku hlela ku humelela ku suka eka Vuhlanganisi bya Rixaka byo sungula ku ya eka Vuhlanganisi bya Rixaka bya Vumbirhi naswona hi ku landzelela Xiviko xa Vuhlanganisi bya Vunharhu, tanihilaha swi nga kamberiwa hakona hi vaaki va matiko ya misava na lava khumbhekaka kwala kay Milawumbisi1.

src_text: Khabinete yi pasisile ku rhumeriwa ka Nawumbisi wa Nhluvukiso wa swa le Lwandle wa 2018 ePalamend Nawumbisi lowu ku nga burisaniwa na hinkwavo lava khumbhekaka lava nga fanela, wu lava ku tlakusa nhluvukiso wa swa le lwandle eka ikhonomi ya le lwandl Wu nyika, eka swin'wana swa kona, mitwanano ya mihlangano ya sekithara, ku endla mapapila ya mpfumelelo na swilaveko swa mpfumelelo eka swa le lwandle na ku tumbuluxiwa ka tizoni ta nhluvukiso ta swa le lwandle Khabinete yi pasisile ku rhumeriwa ka Nawumbisi wa Vuhlayiseki na Rihanyo ra le Ntirhweni wa 2018 ePalamend Nawumbisi wu antswisa Nawu wa Vuhlayiseki na Rihanyo ra le Ntirhweni, 1993 (Nawu wa 85 wa 1993).
trg_text: of 2018 to Parliamen The Bill amends the Occupational Health and Safety Act, 1993 (Act 85 of 1993).

src_text: Loko wu amukeriwile, Nawumbisi wu ta tiyisisa nsirhelelo wa le henhla wa vatirhi loko swi ta eka ku vaviseka na mavabyi etindhawini ta ntirhNawumbisi wu tumbuluxa nhlamuselo leyi nga erivaleni ya Sisiteme ya Vufambisi bya Vuhlayiseki na Rihanyo leyi fambisanaka na matirhelo ya xiyimo xa le henhla xa matiko ya misav Wu tlhela wu nyika vuhleri bya nxungeto lowu bohaka ku va wu endliwa hi muthori na kungu ra mafambiselo ya nxungeto wo nkarhi wa laha ku tirhiwaka kona ku va wu endliwa na ku simekiwa ku hunguta ku va ekhombyeni ka vathoriw Mahungu ya nkoka Ku hoyozela Khabinete yi hoyozela Phuresidente Ramaphosa, loyi a nga rhambiwa hi Khomfarense ya Nhlangano wa Vatirhi va Matiko ya Misava (ILO) ya Huvo leyi Fumaka ku va mutshamaxitulukulorhi eka Mitirho ya Mundzuku eka Khomixini ya Misav

src_text: Phuresidente u tlhele a rhambiwa ku nyika mbulavulo eka khomfarense, leyi tlangelaka 100 wa malembe yi ri kon Loko a ha ri kwale, u ta tlhela a tsundzuka na ku xixima Malembexidzana ya Khale ka Phuresidente Nelson Mandel Khabinete yi nkhensa Ntlawa wa Afrika eka huvo ya mafumele ya ILO ku va yi rhangela mbhurisano eGeneva na ku khensa mivulavurisano leyi nga khomiweke hi vandla leri fumaka eka miganga ya kwala kaya Marito yo Chavelela Khabinete yi rhumela marito yo chavelela eka ndyangu na vanghana va khale na Holobye wo sungula wa Timali eka Afrika-Dzonga ra xidemokirasi, Tat Derek Keys, loyi a nga hoxa xandla swinene eka ku hundzisela Nkwama wa tiko ku ya eka mfumo wa xidemokirasi lowu nga hlawuriwa hi 1994.
trg_text: Cabinet met on Wednesday, 9 May 2018, at Tuynhuys, Cape Town Issues in the environment1.

src_text: Ramadan Khabinete yi rhumela ku navelela ka kahle eka rixaka ra Mamozileme loko va ha sungula ku titsona eka n'hweti yo tenga ya Ramadan vhiki leri landzak Hi nkarhi wa Ramadan, Mamozileme va titsona ku sukela loko dyambu ri tlhava ku fikela loko ripela, loko va teka nkarhi va kula eximoyen Mitlangu leyi landzelaka1.

src_text: Namuntlha Phuresidente Ramaphosa, 10 Mudyaxihi 2018, u ta endzela Ndzawulo ya Vusirheleri na Ndzawulo ya Mfumontirhisano na Timhaka ta Xintu (CoGTA) hi ku landzelelana, tanihi xiphemu xakwe xa ku burisana na vurhangerinkulu ku tiyisisa leswaku mitirho ya mfumo yi fambisana kahl Riendzo leri i xiphemu xa ku tinyikela ka Phuresidente tanihiloko a vurile eka Mbulavulo wa yena na Rixaka wo sungula hi Nyenyanyana 2018 wa ku endzela ndzawulo yin'wana na yin'wana ya rixaka hi mayelana na mhaka leyi Namuntlha Xandla xa Phuresidente David Mabuza, 10 Mudyaxihi 2018, u ta vulavula eka Samiti ya vunharhu ya Huvo ya Nhluvukiso wa Vuthori ya Afrika-Dzonga eEmperors Palace eJoni ehansi ka nkongomelo: 'Xinakulobye xa ku pfuxelela ntirho na ku dyondz' Samiti ya masiku mambirhi yi ta tisa varhangeri va vumaki bya nkoka, vativi va swa mitirho na swidyondzeki ku tekela enhlokweni timhaka to hambanahambana, ku katsa na swiringanyeto swa ku tirhana na ku pfumaleka ka mitirho ya vantshwa, na ku yisa emahlweni ku nyika matimba ku yisa emahlweni na Hundzuluxo wa Vumaki wa Vumune Khabinete yi tlhela yi vuyelerisa xirhambo eka MaAfrika-Dzonga hinkwawo ku va

va nghenelela eka ku tlangela Malembexidzana ya Tatana Nelson Mandela na Manana Albertina Sisulu, lava nga pfuna ku aka masungulo ya xidemokirasi xa Afrika-Dzonga lexi hi tiphinaka ha xona namuntlh Komiti ya Vaholobye ya Malembexidzana ya Nelson Mandela na Malembexidzana ya Albertina Sisulu yi simekile Phurogireme ya Rixaka vhiki ler Vuxokoxoko bya ku tlangela byi nga kumeka eka webusayiti ya mfumo eka (wwgoza)), laha mitlangu yin'wana leyi ya ha taka ya mfumo na migingiriko yi nga kumekaka kon Ku thoriwaKu thoriwa ku va kona endzhaku ka nkambelo wa tidyondzo na mbhasiso lowu faneleke Manana Lerato Mataboge tanihi muyimeri wa dti eka Huvo ya ku Rhumeriwa ka Ndzindzakhombo wa Xikweleti wa Afrika-Dzonga SOC limited Manana RS Mogaladi tanihi Xandla xa Mulawuri wo Angarhela: Mafambiselo na Nseketelo wa Nhlangano, CoGTSwivutiso:Manana Phumla Williams(Muvulavuleri wo Khomela wa Khabinete)Riqingho ra le nyongeni: 083 501 0139Siku: 10 Mudyaxihi 2018Xi humesiwile hi: Vufambisi bya Mfumo bya Vuhlanganisi na Mahungu (GCIS)wwgcigoza; wwgoza
